not.sqlCheck: select count(*) from encounter e inner join encounter_type et on et.encounter_type_id = e.encounter_type where e.visit_id is null and e.voided = 0 and encounter_type not in (select encounter_type_id from encounter_type where uuid in ('10db3139-07c0-4766-b4e5-a41b01363145','1545d7ff-60f1-485e-9c95-5740b8e6634b','873f968a-73a8-4f9c-ac78-9f4778b751b6', '4d77916a-0620-11e5-a6c0-1697f925ec7b','5b1b4a4e-0084-4137-87db-dba76c784439','74cef0a6-2801-11e6-b67b-9e71128cae77','d5ca53a7-d3b5-44ac-9aa2-1491d2a4b4e9', '873f968a-73a8-4f9c-ac78-9f4778b751b6','39C09928-0CAB-4DBA-8E48-39C631FA4286','b3a0e3ad-b80c-4f3f-9626-ace1ced7e2dd')) and exists (select 1 from visit v where e.patient_id = v.patient_id and ((date(v.date_stopped) = date(e.encounter_datetime)) or (v.date_started <= e.encounter_datetime and v.date_stopped >=e.encounter_datetime)));

changeSet.comment: SL-306 fix Wellbody encounters not slotted into visits

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from obs where void_reason = 'SL-409 fix data from wrong htmlform tags';

changeSet.author: mgoodrich
changeSet.comment: SL-761 Fix Program Enrollment Locations for KGH and Wellbody
changeSet.sql: update program p, patient_program pp, location l, location pl set pp.location_id = pl.location_id, pp.date_changed = now(), pp.changed_by = 1 where pp.location_id = l.location_id and pl.location_id = l.parent_location and (pl.uuid = '0561303b-9868-4a1d-933d-fe52ce1b8c9f' or pl.uuid = '074b2ab0-716a-11eb-8aa6-0242ac110002' or pl.uuid = '067c83ad-6850-11ee-ab8d-0242ac120002'); update program p, patient_program pp, location l, location pl set pp.location_id = pl.location_id, pp.date_changed = now(), pp.changed_by = 1 where pp.location_id = l.location_id and pl.location_id = l.parent_location and (pl.uuid = '0561303b-9868-4a1d-933d-fe52ce1b8c9f' or pl.uuid = '074b2ab0-716a-11eb-8aa6-0242ac110002' or pl.uuid = '067c83ad-6850-11ee-ab8d-0242ac120002');

changeSet.author: ball
changeSet.comment: SL-762 Void MCH program enrollment for KGH and Wellbody
changeSet.sql:
update program p, patient_program pp set pp.voided = 1, pp.date_voided = now(), pp.voided_by = 1, pp.void_reason ='Voided MCH program' where p.uuid = '41a2715e-8a14-11e8-9a94-a6cf71072f73' and pp.program_id = p.program_id and pp.voided = 0;
update patient_program pp, patient_state ps set ps.voided = 1, ps.date_voided = now(), ps.voided_by = 1, ps.void_reason ='Voided MCH program' where pp.program_id IN (select p.program_id from program p where p.uuid ='41a2715e-8a14-11e8-9a94-a6cf71072f73') and pp.patient_program_id = ps.patient_program_id and ps.voided = 0;

changeSet.author: ball

not.sqlCheck: select count(*) from obs o where o.concept_id = concept_from_mapping('CIEL','164401') and o.voided = 0 and o.encounter_id IN (select e.encounter_id from encounter e where e.encounter_type IN (select et.encounter_type_id from encounter_type et where et.name like 'ANC%'));
